name: House of Specters
description:
House of Specters is a party platformer that progressively gets harder with each level of the house you complete.

Take control of one of the many colored Specters that run wild throughout the house.

Play solo, or grab up to 7 friends to play with as you make your way through 10 very challenging levels meant to test your friendship...

You will encounter:
- Lots of jumping
- Moving platforms
- Special platforms
- Moving saws
- Fans blowing you around
- Checkpoints (for those long levels)
- And so much more!
